https://image.tmdb.org/t/p/w500/3C2KwqyTqgLXr5sUrG7Ik1IDfop.jpg Four friends -- Pankaj (Naseeruddin Shah), Bobby (Atul Kulkarni), Shakti Chinappa (Ravi Kissen), Albert Pinto (Kay Kay Menon) -- want to rob a lonely house in a lonely stretch of it's Rs 20 crore fake Indian currency... and the very fake note vending machine that lies in there. Just one problem: They have no plan... Chaalis Chauraasi
